news.title: Hospitality hit by half of all UK job losses since budget, industry leaders warn
news.summary: Lobby group calls for urgent action to lower taxes, but the government says it is helping establishments.

news.title: Virginia Giuffre memoir to be published months after death
news.summary: She had finished working on the "intimate" and "heartbreaking" book before she took her own life in April, her publisher says.

news.title: Medvedev has US Open meltdown after photographer interrupts play
news.summary: Daniil Medvedev is out of the US Open after a remarkable defeat by Benjamin Bonzi, where a photographer walking on to the court changed the course of the match.

news.title: Mushroom murderer left me half alive, only survivor of toxic lunch tells court
news.summary: Family members of the three people Erin Patterson murdered with toxic mushrooms have confronted her in court.

news.title: Get ready for fracking, Reform UK tells energy firms
news.summary: The party is serious about going after shale gas - but critics argue it's too difficult and costly.

news.title: Lives torn apart by fatal crashes on Scotland's longest road
news.summary: The family of an American woman who died in a crash on the A9 with her brother and mother talk about the impact.

news.title: Why should I care about the crisis-hit Chinese property giant Evergrande?
news.summary: The stricken company's shares have been removed from the Hong Kong stock market.

news.summary: Find out if you're forecast to become the BBC's next star meteorologist by playing our new guessing game

news.title: UK could hit 30C on bank holiday Monday ahead of rain
news.summary: The heat will be short-lived, with wet and windy weather expected for most by mid week.

news.title: Chinese property giant Evergrande delisted after spectacular fall
news.summary: The embattled property giant's shares were taken off the Hong Kong stock market on Monday.
